title: Awesome List Updates on Dec 12, 2022

items.title: Awesome Cl
items.content_text:
### Web frameworks / Clack plugins

*   [ningle (‚≠ê287)](https://github.com/fukamachi/ningle) - A super-micro web framework. [LLGPL](http://opensource.franz.com/preamble.html).
    *   [jingle (‚≠ê48)](https://github.com/dnaeon/cl-jingle) - based on ningle, adds  bells and whistles, such as middlewares.
        *   includes an OpenAPI and Swagger UI demo.
items.content_html:
Web frameworks / Clack plugins

  • ningle (‚≠ê287) - A super-micro web framework. LLGPL.
    • jingle (‚≠ê48) - based on ningle, adds bells and whistles, such as middlewares.
      • includes an OpenAPI and Swagger UI demo.

items.title: Awesome Dos
items.content_text:
### General

*   [Programmer's Heaven (InfoMagic)(March 1997) CD-ROM](http://discmaster.textfiles.com/view/4555/Programmer%27s%20Heaven%20%28InfoMagic%29%28March%201997%29.BIN%2Fmain.htm) - Source code and files for the following topics: MS-DOS, networking, C, C++, Pascal, Visual Basic, Delphi, 3D, PC speaker, Soundblaster, Gravis Ultrasound, MIDI and many more.

### Sound / SVGA

*   [Programming Sound Cards CD](http://discmaster.textfiles.com/browse/63/Programming%20Sound%20Cards.iso) - A 1995 CD-ROM containing source code for Adlib, Gravis, Pro-Audio, Roland and Sound Blaster sound cards. The description for the folders on the CD-ROM is listed [on the back of the CD-ROM case.](https://archive.org/details/programming-sound-cards/Programming%20Sound%20Cards_back.jpg)

### Open source DOS games / Homebrew games with source code

*   [Plutonium Caverns (‚≠ê10)](https://github.com/jani-nykanen/plutonium-caverns) - Overhead puzzle game written in C. Web version uses [DOSBox ported to Emscripten (‚≠ê1.2k)](https://github.com/dreamlayers/em-dosbox) to embed DOSBox into HTML5. However, the original executable is also downloadable and buildable with Open Watcom.
items.content_html:
General

  • Programmer's Heaven (InfoMagic)(March 1997) CD-ROM - Source code and files for the following topics: MS-DOS, networking, C, C++, Pascal, Visual Basic, Delphi, 3D, PC speaker, Soundblaster, Gravis Ultrasound, MIDI and many more.

Sound / SVGA

  • Programming Sound Cards CD - A 1995 CD-ROM containing source code for Adlib, Gravis, Pro-Audio, Roland and Sound Blaster sound cards. The description for the folders on the CD-ROM is listed on the back of the CD-ROM case.

Open source DOS games / Homebrew games with source code

  • Plutonium Caverns (‚≠ê10) - Overhead puzzle game written in C. Web version uses DOSBox ported to Emscripten (‚≠ê1.2k) to embed DOSBox into HTML5. However, the original executable is also downloadable and buildable with Open Watcom.

items.title: Awesome Flame
items.content_text:
### App Releases / Arcade

*   Oh Dash! - [Android](https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=br.arkd.owdash), [iOS](https://apps.apple.com/br/app/oh-dash/id6443688260) - Play a fast paced arcade game by dodging various hazards and try to be top player on the world! - By [Davi Bispo](https://github.com/arcadekenan)
items.content_html:
App Releases / Arcade

  • Oh Dash! - Android, iOS - Play a fast paced arcade game by dodging various hazards and try to be top player on the world! - By Davi Bispo

items.title: Awesome Neovim
items.content_text:
### Marks / Diagnostics

*   [cbochs/grapple.nvim (‚≠ê634)](https://github.com/cbochs/grapple.nvim) - Provides tagging, cursor tracking, and immediate navigation to important project files.

### Preconfigured Configuration / Diagnostics

*   [ldelossa/nvim-ide (‚≠ê858)](https://github.com/ldelossa/nvim-ide) - A full featured IDE layer heavily inspired by VSCode.

items.title: Awesome Vite
items.content_text:
### Templates / Vue 3

*   [vue-xs-admin (‚≠ê134)](https://github.com/jsxiaosi/vue-xs-admin) - Based on Vue3, Vite3 ElementPlus, TypeScript, Pinia, VueRouter.

### Templates / React

*   [react-vite-template (‚≠ê29)](https://github.com/985563349/react-vite-template) - A react project template.

### Framework-agnostic Plugins / Transformers

*   [vite-plugin-optimize-css-modules (‚≠ê41)](https://github.com/Simonwep/vite-plugin-optimize-css-modules) - Generate the smallest possible CSS-Classes when CSS-Modules are used.

### Preact / Presets

*   [@preact/preset-vite (‚≠ê278)](https://github.com/preactjs/preset-vite) - Preact preset. HMR, automatic Preact inject, removal of DevTools in prod.
items.content_html:

items.title: Awesome Sitecore
items.content_text:
### WebApi

*   [Sitecore Services Client Publish (‚≠ê1)](https://github.com/peplau/SscPublish) - A Web API method to securely trigger a Sitecore publish of an item or tree.
